metadata.description: Spells that heal and enhance the human body

spells.name: Chirurgeon's Healing Touch
spells.description: Heals one Light wound completely, or reduces one Medium wound to Light, or reduces one Heavy wound to Medium. Cannot heal wounds from deprivation.

spells.name: Bind Wound
spells.description: Instantly stops bleeding from any wound and prevents infection. Does not actually heal damage but stabilizes the patient.

spells.name: Purification of the Festering Wounds
spells.description: Heals one Heavy wound completely, or heals all Light and Medium wounds. Removes infection and disease from wounds.

spells.name: Physician's Eye
spells.description: Instantly diagnoses all diseases, poisons, and injuries affecting the target. Provides precise medical knowledge.
spells.guidelines: Base 1 (sense health), +1 Touch, +1 for detailed diagnosis

spells.name: Gentle Touch of the Purified Body
spells.description: Neutralizes minor poisons and removes minor diseases. Does not work against supernatural afflictions.

spells.name: Gift of Vigor
spells.description: Removes all Fatigue levels and grants immunity to natural fatigue for the duration. Does not protect against magical fatigue.

spells.name: Endurance of the Berserkers
spells.description: Grants +3 to Stamina for resisting fatigue, disease, and poison. Also provides +1 Soak against physical damage.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance body), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +2 for significant enhancement

spells.name: Blessing of Childlike Grace
spells.description: Makes the target appear healthy, young, and attractive. Adds +2 to all social interactions and removes signs of aging or disease.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (improve appearance), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +1 for significant change

spells.name: Restoration of the Defiled Body
spells.description: Heals all wounds and removes all diseases and poisons. Restores lost limbs and organs, but cannot restore those lost to old age.

spells.name: Invocation of Weariness
spells.description: Removes one Fatigue level from everyone in a group. Particularly useful for tired travelers or workers.
